content.raw:
The original parameters seemed arbitrary, but the second parameter was positive. For the most barrel-y barrel distortion, all the parameters should be negative.

The tangential distortion values are also unnecessary, and might throw off the test because of opposing effects with the radial parameters. I didn't look at tangential distortion too much in this PR, additional work would be needed to write a test for it. The tangential values are extremely small for most cameras.
content.html:
The original parameters seemed arbitrary, but the second parameter was positive. For the most barrel-y barrel distortion, all the parameters should be negative.

The tangential distortion values are also unnecessary, and might throw off the test because of opposing effects with the radial parameters. I didn't look at tangential distortion too much in this PR, additional work would be needed to write a test for it. The tangential values are extremely small for most cameras.
